title: Cryptoultra6526
author: Cryptoultra6526
content: Currently, the cryptocurrency market is abuzz with various projects like Unibot, Banana Bot, Unichat, and many others that are generating substantial profits for early investors. Among these, an upcoming project called Bubble Bot has caught my attention. The Bubble Bot project, which can be found at Bubblebot.finance, appears to hold significant potential. They are offering a range of features including spot trading, hedge/risk management for pegged assets, multi-staking options, and even futures trading with limit orders.What stands out about Bubble Bot is its active presence on platforms like Telegram and Discord, where they are actively engaging with their community and providing valuable insights. The team behind Bubble Bot also appears to be quite competitive and skilled.However, it's important to remember that new cryptocurrency projects carry inherent risks. While they do offer the potential for substantial profits, they are also susceptible to volatility and uncertainties in the market. Therefore, before considering any investment, it's advisable to do thorough research, assess the project's fundamentals, and consult with experts in the field to make an informed decision.Web and white paper links are below;link: https://bubblebot.finance/whitepaper: https://bubble-bot.gitbook.io/bubblebot-guide/

comments.author: Kelvinid
comments.body: Quote from: Cryptoultra6526 on September 19, 2023, 05:03:14 PMHowever, it's important to remember that new cryptocurrency projects carry inherent risks. While they do offer the potential for substantial profits, they are also susceptible to volatility and uncertainties in the market. Therefore, before considering any investment, it's advisable to do thorough research, assess the project's fundamentals, and consult with experts in the field to make an informed decision.You're right. Well, I believe that you've done research about the said project, and asking you what you think, is this can be trusted or worthless?And whatever you said, still I don't easily fall into trusting new projects. Why? I will stand believing that most of them are scams. Though they will show promising project fundamentals, good whitepaper, and big names behind them, still no assurance for their success, and most of the time fail because of the lack of support from the community.

comments.author: justdimin
comments.body: Quote from: Cryptoultra6526 on September 19, 2023, 05:03:14 PMCurrently, the cryptocurrency market is abuzz with various projects like Unibot, Banana Bot, Unichat, and many others that are generating substantial profits for early investors. Among these, an upcoming project called Bubble Bot has caught my attention. The Bubble Bot project, which can be found at Bubblebot.finance, appears to hold significant potential. They are offering a range of features including spot trading, hedge/risk management for pegged assets, multi-staking options, and even futures trading with limit orders.What stands out about Bubble Bot is its active presence on platforms like Telegram and Discord, where they are actively engaging with their community and providing valuable insights. The team behind Bubble Bot also appears to be quite competitive and skilled.Why? Why are you doing this, do you think that this would make you any profit at all. Is it way too simple nowadays to get a website, not like .finance domains are cheap neither, so it doesn't make sense to lose this much money on building something that you can scam off people.I suggest finding some other method that you can do in order to get money, crypto is an endless pit of money where you can make millions of dollars. In fact, even the talents that you have to build something like this could be marketed in a way where you can do it for other projects and charge them money, it would be quite good and you could make an income for yourself with it, I do not get why people do not just prefer that over this.

comments.author: Jating
comments.body: Quote from: Kelvinid on September 19, 2023, 09:41:40 PMQuote from: Cryptoultra6526 on September 19, 2023, 05:03:14 PMHowever, it's important to remember that new cryptocurrency projects carry inherent risks. While they do offer the potential for substantial profits, they are also susceptible to volatility and uncertainties in the market. Therefore, before considering any investment, it's advisable to do thorough research, assess the project's fundamentals, and consult with experts in the field to make an informed decision.You're right. Well, I believe that you've done research about the said project, and asking you what you think, is this can be trusted or worthless?And whatever you said, still I don't easily fall into trusting new projects. Why? I will stand believing that most of them are scams. Though they will show promising project fundamentals, good whitepaper, and big names behind them, still no assurance for their success, and most of the time fail because of the lack of support from the community. Yes, this is very true, so it is still 50/50 to me, whether there is a good project to invest? remains to be seen. But then there are also projects that becomes meme coins like Shiba Inu, but really take off in the beginning without any questions and investors willing to take that risk.So it's like a gamble, so either it will pay dividends or not in the end. And it's really up to your risk appetite, if you love that kind of risk then go for it. But if you are conservative enough then it's better to do your own investigation before investing. I like it though that bot are the new trend right now.

comments.author: cute nmp
comments.body: Some can be a viable investment choice while others are not. It totally depends on the project some have a very good concept while others are simply just hype. Make sure to make a good research on any project before making your investment choice to avoid losing your funds.

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: This happens to the third thread I stumble over the link of bubblebot.finance may alt accounts of the two or part of a team that shills why can't these people just create an official announcement in the Altcoin announcement they have a better chance to establish a community, instead create a lot of new thread here to promote their shitcoin.People should not trust shill marketing OP and his team can launch a bounty campaign they will have a wide reach if they launch proper marketing and it will establish a good reputation if they do their marketing in a proper way.

comments.author: danherbias07
comments.body: Uncertainties. That's true and this is the big risk factor when it comes to new cryptocurrencies that will enter the market. But, I think you did good at researching so it's all on you if it's worth the money to invest. In my case, I am done with new cryptocurrencies for now and just keeping it fixated with the popular ones. You could say I became lazy at investing and supporting new projects and I am going nowhere. I cannot find that gem that would really make some profits in the long run and I got tired of it. Bitcoin has many good things that will happen in a few months or a year so that's my first option. In the altcoin division, I still have 3 good names that I want to keep and I am expecting them to do good when Bitcoin pumps when the Spot ETF comes to life.

comments.author: passwordnow
comments.body: I guess that both of you are somehow connected or it could also be you that has made the same thread[1] on this section about that bot.[1] Is crypto Trading is difficult for you?There's no need for you to do these types of discussions when you're trying to advertise the same project or bot. Just stay on one topic/thread and don't have to make a new one for what you're introducing.

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Quote from: cute nmp on September 24, 2023, 11:09:25 AMSome can be a viable investment choice while others are not. It totally depends on the project some have a very good concept while others are simply just hype. Make sure to make a good research on any project before making your investment choice to avoid losing your funds.Theres plenty of new project on the horizons and we cant simply narrowed it down to the best one. Yes new projects literally carry risk and thats what we need to eliminate upon due diligence. Im not saying OPs share of interest with the project is wrong but if you browse the website and its affiliated socials you can see that its not as quality as it is. Not saying Im good on research but you can check the website itself and for me theres nothing special about this one.

comments.author: The Cryptovator
comments.body: I don't hate real crypto projects that introduce new cryptocurrencies. But I hate scammers who capitalise on the current trend. There were a couple of successful bot projects that did very well. Now scammers are taking advantage of the trending projects. So we have to choose solid projects when thinking about investing. Though new projects bring opportunities to make money faster, they may cause you to lose money afterwards as well. So be very careful with new projects.

comments.author: Wexnident
comments.body: Quote from: Cryptoultra6526 on September 19, 2023, 05:03:14 PM~First time I've hear about these projects. New projects naturally generate more substantial profits compared to say Bitcoin, ETH, or any other old coin out there simply because the coin hasn't been spread out to other people yet. Ofc, this also provides risk that said coin would be monopolized and artificially manipulated by someone or some group. And it also doesn't help that most "new" projects are actually just recycled of currently existing projects and/or are giving out unrealistic promises that probably wouldn't be realized until a decade or so of full-time investment in terms of developing it. Or with zero progress, as most projects start out. They probably mistook this for crowdfunding instead really.

comments.author: Silberman
comments.body: Quote from: Cryptoultra6526 on September 19, 2023, 05:03:14 PMCurrently, the cryptocurrency market is abuzz with various projects like Unibot, Banana Bot, Unichat, and many others that are generating substantial profits for early investors. Among these, an upcoming project called Bubble Bot has caught my attention. The Bubble Bot project, which can be found at Bubblebot.finance, appears to hold significant potential. They are offering a range of features including spot trading, hedge/risk management for pegged assets, multi-staking options, and even futures trading with limit orders.What stands out about Bubble Bot is its active presence on platforms like Telegram and Discord, where they are actively engaging with their community and providing valuable insights. The team behind Bubble Bot also appears to be quite competitive and skilled.However, it's important to remember that new cryptocurrency projects carry inherent risks. While they do offer the potential for substantial profits, they are also susceptible to volatility and uncertainties in the market. Therefore, before considering any investment, it's advisable to do thorough research, assess the project's fundamentals, and consult with experts in the field to make an informed decision.If this is your project just be honest and create an ANN thread for it, instead of trying to make it seem as if this is a project you just found and suddenly got interested on it, those tactics are precisely what cause a lot of people to be on guard against the majority of the new projects out there, as even if the profits which can be generated are attractive, we have seen many people get burned by investing in those coins and losing everything simply because they let their greed get the best of them.

comments.author: serjent05
comments.body: QuoteWhat stands out about Bubble Bot is its active presence on platforms like Telegram and Discord, where they are actively engaging with their community and providing valuable insights. The team behind Bubble Bot also appears to be quite competitive and skilled.This is nothing new, all newly created project have this platform enable for their interactions.  This also does not guarantee if the project is viable or not.  Since there had been many projects that happened to have way more than these platforms as communication but still failed to deliver.QuoteHowever, it's important to remember that new cryptocurrency projects carry inherent risks. While they do offer the potential for substantial profits, they are also susceptible to volatility and uncertainties in the market. Therefore, before considering any investment, it's advisable to do thorough research, assess the project's fundamentals, and consult with experts in the field to make an informed decision.I highly agree, the research should start with the people behind the project.  How capable they are and how transparent are their credentials.  Many developers are exaggerating their accomplishments to make their portfolio look good but in the end, they fail to deliver.  The whitepaper, websites, and roadmap are all secondary.  Know the people behind the project and it will tell us what would be the fate of the project is.

comments.author: shinratensei_
comments.body: based on fundamental analysis you can judge whether a project is really good for investment and deserving the investment money that you gonna spent but it seemsyou here are just trying to promote your project.its just promoting like this creating various threads will result in spammy behaviour that will give your project really bad impression in the long run.moreover the fact that many have found some strange things about the project you are advertising.

comments.author: Saisher
comments.body: Quote from: passwordnow on September 24, 2023, 06:42:06 PMI guess that both of you are somehow connected or it could also be you that has made the same thread[1] on this section about that bot.[1] Is crypto Trading is difficult for you?There's no need for you to do these types of discussions when you're trying to advertise the same project or bot. Just stay on one topic/thread and don't have to make a new one for what you're introducing.They are spamming this section with their shitcoin and their APY is unrealistic once a project offered a very huge APY you know that this is a Ponzi scheme, Ponzi schemes are like this they do shill marketing, but they cannot fool people here, those who know how Ponzi schemes operate have exposed them, I hope people will not be blinded by their greed to invest in this kind of project.Quote from: albon on September 20, 2023, 10:35:40 PM[1] After opening the website, clicking on the dashboard, and then on the overview of the bubble bot, I found that they offered a new stake with an interface of 1,208,325.83% for users with rewards from different currencies. Is it possible for this massive APY for this new project whose domain was launched on Friday, 8th of September 2023 (12 days)?? Add that there is no information about their bubble token.

comments.author: X-ray
comments.body: Enough is enough. Are not you feeling bored to make more and more shittty topic for the promotional purpose of your platform? https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5467477.0https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5467806.0How many times you made a new account and coming back with the different topic?People in here know what you have done exactly. Stop scamming people!You remind me with so many shit scam staking yield projects in the past which have gone caused by they were scam. Bubblebot is probably one of them.

comments.author: passwordnow
comments.body: Quote from: Saisher on September 24, 2023, 11:47:27 PMQuote from: passwordnow on September 24, 2023, 06:42:06 PMI guess that both of you are somehow connected or it could also be you that has made the same thread[1] on this section about that bot.[1] Is crypto Trading is difficult for you?There's no need for you to do these types of discussions when you're trying to advertise the same project or bot. Just stay on one topic/thread and don't have to make a new one for what you're introducing.They are spamming this section with their shitcoin and their APY is unrealistic once a project offered a very huge APY you know that this is a Ponzi scheme, Ponzi schemes are like this they do shill marketing, I just hope that the newbies that have seen them post will not go engage with such projects that offer high APYs. It should be realistic and sustainable but we can't stop those people who might chase these projects because of the thinking that whoever goes first, always gets the most out of it. But that's not the case because there could also be something wrong with them being the first and they don't have an idea as things could literally go south.Quote from: Saisher on September 24, 2023, 11:47:27 PMbut they cannot fool people here, those who know how Ponzi schemes operate have exposed them, I hope people will not be blinded by their greed to invest in this kind of project.Sadly, there could be a couple and a few people who might be a victim of these schemes. But as long as there are reminders and curious people that will take a look at what they're promoting, there will be many people that will be alerted by such schemes.
